text: A man got lost in the desert. I was about to die of thirst when some women showed up in a caravan. The man, on the brink of death, cried out for help. When the women approached him and surrounded him, he urged for water. The women began to look at him carefully and wonder how the man would like to be served water. Would you rather be in a glass cup or a cup, in a gold or silver vessel, perhaps in a jar? They talked and talked, interested in the object, but, meanwhile, the man was dying for the absence of water. FIN
title: Lo esencial y lo trivial
author: nan Anónimo
